scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run sync-constants && cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run start --workspace=client && npm run start --workspace=server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=client && npm run lint --workspace=server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=client && npm run lint:fix --workspace=server
scripts.update-all: npm update --workspace client && npm update --workspace server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.clean: cd client && npm run clean && cd ../server && npm run clean
scripts.superclean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules dist client/dist server/dist package-lock.json client/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json .eslintcache .jest .nyc_output coverage .cache .next
